:defaultValue.description: The value of the slider when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the state of the slider.

modelValue.description: The controlled value of the slider. Must be binded with v-model.

name.description: The name of the slider. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

disabled.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the slider.

dir.description: The reading direction of the slider. If omitted, inherits globally from DirectionProvider or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.

inverted.description: Whether the slider is visually inverted.

min.description: The minimum value for the range.

max.description: The maximum value for the range.

minStepsBetweenThumbs.description: The minimum permitted steps between multiple thumbs.

as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
